languages.text: "Я не доверяю этому человеку быть в команде кормчего... но и талантами разбрасываться нельзя. Передайте его фактотуму, он найдет, куда приспособить".

traits.locale_text: "Отчитайся Фактотуму, он найдет, куда приспособить твои навыки".

languages.text: "I do not trust this man to remain in the Master Helmsman's crew... but I cannot allow such talent to go to waste. Hand him over to the Factotum, he will find a use for him."
languages.original_text: "Я не доверяю этому человеку быть в команде кормчего... но и талантами разбрасываться нельзя. Передайте его фактотуму, он найдет, куда приспособить".

traits.locale_text: "I do not trust this man to remain in the helmsman's crew... but I cannot allow such talent to go to waste. Hand him over to the Factotum, he will find a use for him."
"I do not trust this man to remain in the helmsman's crew... but I cannot allow such talent to go to waste. Hand him over to the Factotum, he will find a use for him."
"I do not trust this man to remain in the helmsman's crew... but I cannot allow such talent to go to waste. Hand him over to the Factotum, he will find a use for him."
"I do not trust this man to remain in the Master Helmsman's crew... but I cannot allow such talent to go to waste. Hand him over to the Factotum, he will find a use for him."
"I do not trust this man to remain in the Master Helmsman's crew... but I cannot allow such talent to go to waste. Hand him over to the Factotum, he will find a use for him."

languages.text: 「この男をマスター・ヘルムスマンのクルーとして置いておくのは信用できない…だからといって、これほどの才能を無駄にするわけにもいかない。ファクトタムに引き渡せ。彼なら使い道を見つけるだろう」
languages.original_text: "I do not trust this man to remain in the Master Helmsman's crew... but I cannot allow such talent to go to waste. Hand him over to the Factotum, he will find a use for him."

traits.locale_text: 「この男をマスター・ヘルムスマンのクルーとして置いておくのは信用できない…だからといって、これほどの才能を無駄にするわけにもいかない。ファクトタムに引き渡せ。彼なら使い道を見つけるだろう」

languages.text: "Bu adamın, Başserdümen'in mürettebatında kalması hususunda içim rahat değil... Ancak böylesi bir yeteneğin harcanmasına da izin veremem. Kâhyaya yönlendirin, o ne yapacağını bilir."
languages.original_text: "I do not trust this man to remain in the Master Helmsman's crew... but I cannot allow such talent to go to waste. Hand him over to the Factotum, he will find a use for him."

traits.locale_text: "Bu adamın, Başserdümen'in mürettebatında kalması hususunda içim rahat değil... Ancak böylesi bir yeteneğin harcanmasına da izin veremem. Kâhyaya yönlendirin, o ne yapacağını bilir."

languages.text: «No confío en dejar a este hombre a cargo del maestro timonel... pero tampoco pienso desperdiciar sus talentos. Que el Factótum se encargue, le encontrará alguna utilidad».
languages.original_text: "I do not trust this man to remain in the Master Helmsman's crew... but I cannot allow such talent to go to waste. Hand him over to the Factotum, he will find a use for him."

traits.locale_text: «No confío en dejar a este hombre a cargo del maestro timonel... pero tampoco pienso desperdiciar sus talentos. Que el Factótum se encargue, le encontrará alguna utilidad».

languages.text: “我不打算让这个人继续留在舵手长手下……不过，我也不允许这么有才华的人被白白浪费掉。把他带到高阶顾问那儿吧，詹里斯应该能给他安排个差事。”
languages.original_text: "I do not trust this man to remain in the Master Helmsman's crew... but I cannot allow such talent to go to waste. Hand him over to the Factotum, he will find a use for him."

traits.locale_text: “我不打算让这个人继续留在舵手长手下……不过，我也不允许这么有才华的人被白白浪费掉。把他带到高阶顾问那儿吧，詹里斯应该能给他安排个差事。”

languages.text: « Je ne peux pas permettre à cet homme de rester au sein de l'équipage de mon maître timonier... mais il serait dommage de gâcher un tel talent. Envoyez-le au factotum. Il saura lui trouver une utilité. »
languages.original_text: "I do not trust this man to remain in the Master Helmsman's crew... but I cannot allow such talent to go to waste. Hand him over to the Factotum, he will find a use for him."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne peux pas permettre à cet homme de rester au sein de l'équipage de mon maître timonier... mais il serait dommage de gâcher un tel talent. Envoyez-le au factotum. Il saura lui trouver une utilité. »

languages.text: "Ich traue diesem Mann nicht und will ihn nicht länger in der Crew des Hauptsteuermanns haben ... aber ich darf ein solches Talent nicht vergeuden. Übergebt ihn dem Faktotum. Er wird eine Verwendung für ihn finden."
languages.original_text: "I do not trust this man to remain in the Master Helmsman's crew... but I cannot allow such talent to go to waste. Hand him over to the Factotum, he will find a use for him."

traits.locale_text: "Ich traue diesem Mann nicht und will ihn nicht länger in der Crew des Hauptsteuermanns haben ... aber ich darf ein solches Talent nicht vergeuden. Übergebt ihn dem Faktotum. Er wird eine Verwendung für ihn finden."
